function.name: Get_Packages
function.description: Search the price of car rental and the protection price of insurance. EndPoint: /api/v1/cars/getPackages

vehicle_id.description: Vehicle ID. `vehicle_id` can be retrieved from `api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals`**(Search Car Rentals)** endpoint in **Car Rental** collection as `vehicle_id` inside `search_results` object.

search_key.description: `search_key` can be retrieved from `api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals`**(Search Car Rentals)** endpoint in **Car Rental** collection as `search_key`.

function.name: Get_Filter
function.description: Get the `categories_filter` parameter value for `Search_Hotels` function. EndPoint: /api/v1/hotels/getFilter

categories_filter.description:
`categories_filter` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/getFilter`**(Get Filter)** endpoint in **Hotels** collection.

***Note: For the initial request, leave it blank.***

search_type.description: `search_type` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/searchDestination`**(Search Hotel Destination)** endpoint in **hotel** collection.

children_age.description:
The number of **children**, including **infants**, who are **under 18**.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
`children_age: 0,1,17`

dest_id.description: `dest_id` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/searchDestination`**(Search Hotel Destination)** endpoint in **Hotels** collection.

room_qty.description: The **number** of **rooms** that are required. The **default** value is set to **1**.

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out. DATE (YYYY-MM-DD)

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in. DATE (YYYY-MM-DD)

adults.description: The **number** of guests who are **18 years** of age or **older**. The **default** value is set to **1**.

function.name: Search_Hotels_By_Coordinates
function.description: Search for hotels around a given geographical coordinates. EndPoint: /api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in. DATE (YYYY-MM-DD)

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out. DATE (YYYY-MM-DD)

radius.description:
The hotels that are within the radius. The radius is measured in kilometers.

**Default** is set to **100**.
**Range** is between **10** to **500**.

room_qty.description: The **number** of **rooms** that are required. The **default** value is set to **1**.

latitude.description: Latitude of the searched location. `latitude` can be retrieved from `api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong`**(Location to Lat Long)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

adults.description: The **number** of guests who are **18 years** of age or **older**. The **default** value is set to **1**.

children_age.description:
The number of **children**, including **infants**, who are **under 18**.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
`children_age: 0,1,17`

longitude.description: Longitude of the searched location. `longitude` can be retrieved from `api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong`**(Location to Lat Long)** endpoint in **Meta** collection.

function.name: Get_Hotel_Policies
function.description: Retrieve policies for a specific hotel. EndPoint: /api/v1/hotels/getHotelPolicies

hotel_id.description:
`hotel_id` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/searchHotels`**(Search Hotels)** or `api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates`**(Search Hotels By Coordinates
)** endpoint in **Hotels** collection.

function.name: Get_Min_Price_Multi_Stops
function.description: Get the minimum price for multi-stop flights. This API will return the lowest priced flights within 5 days before and after the query date. EndPoint: /api/v1/flights/getMinPriceMultiStops

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

legs.description:
The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
  {
    'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT',
    'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT',
    'date': '2024-05-25'
  },
…
]
Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.

fromId.description: **From/Departure** location **Id**. `fromId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/flights/searchDestination`**(Search Flight Location)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

toId.description: **To/Arrival** location **Id**. `toId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/flights/searchDestination`**(Search Flight Location)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

function.name: Location_to_Lat_Long
function.description: Get location/address latitude and longitude. EndPoint: /api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong

query.description: Names of locations, apartment, address, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

drop_off_time.description:
Drop off time
Format: **HH:MM**
*Note: The format of time is 24 hours.* TIME (24-hour HH:MM)

drop_off_latitude.description: The drop off location's `latitude`. `drop_off_latitude` can be retrieved from `api/v1/cars/searchDestination`**(Search Car Location)** endpoint in **Car Rental** collection as `latitude` inside `coordinates` object.

function.name: Search_Flights
function.description: Search Flights. EndPoint: /api/v1/flights/searchFlights

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

adults.description: The **number** of guests who are **18 years** of age or **older**. The **default** value is set to **1**.

toId.description: **To/Arrival** airports's location **Id**. `toId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/flights/searchDestination`**(Search Flight Location)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

fromId.description: **From/Departure** airports's location **Id**. `fromId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/flights/searchDestination`**(Search Flight Location)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

children.description:
The number of **children**, including **infants**, who are **under 18**.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
`children_age: 0,1,17`

legs.description:
The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
  {
    'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT',
    'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT',
    'date': '2024-05-25'
  },
…
]
Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.

toId.description: **To/Arrival** airports's location **Id**. `toId` can be retrieved from `api/v1/flights/searchDestination`**(Search Flight Location)** endpoint in **Flights** collection as `id`.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

children.description:
The number of **children**, including **infants**, who are **under 18**.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
`children_age: 0,1,17`

function.name: Vehicle_Supplier_Review
function.description: Get the reviews for the supplier of a specific vehicle. EndPoint: /api/v1/cars/vehicleSupplierReview

function.name: Get_Sort_By
function.description: Get sorted hotel listings based on filters and destination. EndPoint: /api/v1/hotels/getSortBy

dest_id.description: Destination ID. Can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/searchDestination` (Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in Hotels collection.

search_type.description: Search type (e.g., CITY). Can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/searchDestination`.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in. Format: yyyy-mm-dd.

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out. Format: yyyy-mm-dd.

adults.description: Number of guests who are 18 years or older. Default is 1.

children_age.description: Comma-separated list of children's ages (under 18), including infants. Example: '0,1,17' represents 3 children aged 8 months, 1 year, and 17 years.

room_qty.description: Number of rooms required. Default is 1.

categories_filter.description: Can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/getFilter` (Get Filter) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description: To obtain the response in a specific language. Can be retrieved from `api/v1/meta/getLanguages` (Get Languages) endpoint in Meta collection.
